sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YETA3210 ( DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , ELCT_YYMM , SYSTEMKEY , ELCT_DATE , SUPR_TXAM , BUAM_TXAM , INBS_AMNT , STCK_INAM , SPBM_TXAM , ECIN_TXAM , TAXM_ECIN , TAXM_EARN , TAXM_ETAM , TXET_TXAM , ADDR_BHTX , SPCI_HLTH , SPCI_EMPF , NATN_PSNF , EARN_TAXN , IHTX_TAXN , ETCC_TXAM , ETCC_ETAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #edacRvyy# , #settGbcd# , #elctYymm# , #systemkey# , #elctDate# , #suprTxam# , #buamTxam# , #inbsAmnt# , #stckInam# , #spbmTxam# , #ecinTxam# , #taxmEcin# , #taxmEarn# , #taxmEtam# , #txetTxam# , #addrBhtx# , #spciHlth# , #spciEmpf# , #natnPsnf# , #earnTaxn# , #ihtxTaxn# , #etccTxam# , #etccEtam# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )

INSERT INTO YETA3210 ( DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , ELCT_YYMM , SYSTEMKEY , ELCT_DATE , SUPR_TXAM , BUAM_TXAM , INBS_AMNT , STCK_INAM , SPBM_TXAM , ECIN_TXAM , TAXM_ECIN , TAXM_EARN , TAXM_ETAM , TXET_TXAM , ADDR_BHTX , SPCI_HLTH , SPCI_EMPF , NATN_PSNF , EARN_TAXN , IHTX_TAXN , ETCC_TXAM , ETCC_ETAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) (SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , #edacRvyy# , #settGbcd# ,BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH ,AA.SYSTEMKEY , BB.PAY_PYMT_DT , NVL( ( SELECT SUM(TXTN_TOT_AMNT) FROM PAYR0301 A01 WHERE A01.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND A01.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A01.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY),0) AS TXTN_TOT_AMNT ,(0) AS BUAM_TXAM ,(0) AS INBS_AMNT ,(0) AS STCK_INAM , NVL( ( SELECT SUM(TXTN_TOT_AMNT) FROM PAYR0301 A01 WHERE A01.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND A01.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A01.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY),0) AS SPBM_TXAM ,(0) AS ECIN_TXAM ,(0) AS TAXM_ECIN ,(0) AS TAXM_EARN , NVL( ( SELECT SUM(PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM) FROM PAYR0302 A03 WHERE A03.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND A03.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A03.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND A03.PAY_ITEM_CD = 'C9080100'),0) AS TAXM_ETAM , NVL( ( SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT) END FROM PAYR0302 A03 WHERE A03.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND A03.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A03.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND A03.PAY_ITEM_CD = 'C9080100'),0) AS TXET_TXAM , NVL( ( SELECT SUM(PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM) FROM PAYR0302 A03 WHERE A03.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND A03.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A03.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND A03.PAY_ITEM_CD = 'C9050100'),0) AS ADDR_BHTX , NVL( ( SELECT SUM(PYMT_DDUC_SUM) FROM PAYR0302 A03 WHERE A03.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND A03.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A03.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND A03.PAY_ITEM_CD IN ( 'D0010100','D0010200','D0010300' ,'D0010400','D0010500','D0110100' ,'D0110200','D0110300','D0110400','D0110500' ) ),0) AS SPCI_HLTH , NVL( ( SELECT SUM(PYMT_DDUC_SUM) FROM PAYR0302 A03 WHERE A03.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND A03.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A03.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND A03.PAY_ITEM_CD IN ('D0160100','D0160200','D0160300' ) ),0) AS SPCI_EMPF , NVL( ( SELECT SUM(PYMT_DDUC_SUM) FROM PAYR0302 A03 WHERE A03.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND A03.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A03.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND A03.PAY_ITEM_CD IN ( 'D0150100','D0150200','D0150300' ) ),0) AS NATN_PSNF
, NVL( ( SELECT SUM(PYMT_DDUC_SUM) FROM PAYR0302 A03 WHERE A03.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND A03.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A03.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND A03.PAY_ITEM_CD = 'T0010100' ),0) AS EARN_TAXN , NVL( ( SELECT SUM(PYMT_DDUC_SUM) FROM PAYR0302 A03 WHERE A03.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND A03.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A03.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND A03.PAY_ITEM_CD = 'T0020100' ),0) AS IHTX_TAXN ,(0) AS ETCC_TXAM ,(0) AS ETCC_ETAM , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr#
FROM ( SELECT AD02.DPOB_CD ,AD02.SYSTEMKEY ,AD02.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD ,AD02.EMYMT_DIV_CD ,AD02.HAN_NM ,AD02.RESN_REGN_NUM ,DECODE (AD02.EMYMT_DIV_CD, 'A0020020', AD02.DEPT_CD,DECODE(AD01.EMYMT_DIV_CD,'A0020020',AD02.DEPT_CD,AD01.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD)) AS DEPT_CD ,AD02.BUSIN_CD ,DECODE (AD02.EMYMT_DIV_CD, 'A0020020', AD02.TYP_OCCU_CD, DECODE(AD01.EMYMT_DIV_CD,'A0020020',AD02.TYP_OCCU_CD,AD01.TYP_OCCU_CD) ) AS TYP_OCCU_CD ,DECODE (AD02.EMYMT_DIV_CD, 'A0020020', AD02.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, DECODE(AD01.EMYMT_DIV_CD,'A0020020',AD02.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,AD01.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD) ) AS DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD ,DECODE (AD02.EMYMT_DIV_CD, 'A0020020', AD02.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD, DECODE(AD01.EMYMT_DIV_CD,'A0020020',AD02.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD,AD01.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD) ) AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD ,AD02.ODTY_CD ,AD02.PYSP_CD ,AD02.PYSP_GRDE_CD ,AD02.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD ,AD02.LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD ,AD02.FRST_EMYMT_DT ,AD02.EMYMT_BGNN_DT ,AD02.EMYMT_END_DT ,AD01.NATN_CD ,AD01.HDOFC_CODTN_CD ,AD01.RETRY_DT FROM PSNL0100 AD01, PAYR0304 AD02, (SELECT NN.DPOB_CD,NN.PYMT_YR_MNTH ,NN.PAY_CD, NN.SYSTEMKEY , NN.PAYR_SEIL_NUM FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SYSTEMKEY,PYMT_YR_MNTH ASC,PAY_CD ASC,PAYR_SEIL_NUM DESC) SEL_NUM , DPOB_CD, PYMT_YR_MNTH ,PAY_CD, SYSTEMKEY , PAYR_SEIL_NUM FROM PAYR0304 WHERE PYMT_YR_MNTH LIKE #edacRvyy# ||'%' AND EXISTS ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DEPT_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM TABLE(PKG_DTIL_AUTH.FN_DTIL_AUTH_TB(#dpobCd#,#payrMangDeptYn#,#payrMangDeptCd#,#deptCd#,#usrId#,#deptCdAuth#,'' )) ) C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = PAYR0304.DPOB_CD AND C.DEPT_CD = PAYR0304.DEPT_CD AND NVL(C.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') = NVL(PAYR0304.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') AND NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT') = NVL(PAYR0304.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT')
C.DEPT_CD = #deptCd#
) ) NN , ( SELECT MM.DPOB_CD, MM.SYSTEMKEY, MAX(MM.SEL_NUM) AS SEL_NUM FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY DPOB_CD,SYSTEMKEY,PYMT_YR_MNTH ASC,PAY_CD ASC,PAYR_SEIL_NUM DESC) SEL_NUM , DPOB_CD , PYMT_YR_MNTH ,PAY_CD, SYSTEMKEY , PAYR_SEIL_NUM FROM PAYR0304 WHERE PYMT_YR_MNTH LIKE #edacRvyy# ||'%' AND EXISTS ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DEPT_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM TABLE(PKG_DTIL_AUTH.FN_DTIL_AUTH_TB(#dpobCd#,#payrMangDeptYn#,#payrMangDeptCd#,#deptCd#,#usrId#,#deptCdAuth#,'' )) ) C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = PAYR0304.DPOB_CD AND C.DEPT_CD = PAYR0304.DEPT_CD AND NVL(C.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') = NVL(PAYR0304.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') AND NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT') = NVL(PAYR0304.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT')
C.DEPT_CD = #deptCd#
) ) MM GROUP BY DPOB_CD, SYSTEMKEY ) GG WHERE NN.SEL_NUM = GG.SEL_NUM AND NN.DPOB_CD = GG.DPOB_CD AND NN.SYSTEMKEY = GG.SYSTEMKEY ) AD03 WHERE AD02.DPOB_CD = AD01.DPOB_CD AND AD02.SYSTEMKEY = AD01.SYSTEMKEY AND AD02.DPOB_CD = AD03.DPOB_CD AND AD02.PYMT_YR_MNTH = AD03.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND AD02.SYSTEMKEY = AD03.SYSTEMKEY AND AD02.PAY_CD = AD03.PAY_CD AND AD02.PAYR_SEIL_NUM = AD03.PAYR_SEIL_NUM AND AD02.PYMT_YR_MNTH LIKE #edacRvyy# ||'%' ) AA , ( SELECT DISTINCT AC01.DPOB_CD, AC01.PYMT_YR_MNTH, AC01.SYSTEMKEY, AC01.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD, AC01.EMYMT_DIV_CD, AC01.HAN_NM, AC02.PAY_PYMT_DT FROM PAYR0304 AC01 ,(SELECT A03.DPOB_CD, A03.PYMT_YR_MNTH, A03.SYSTEMKEY ,MAX (A02.PAY_PYMT_DT) PAY_PYMT_DT FROM PAYR0300 A02 , PAYR0304 A03 WHERE A02.DPOB_CD = A03.DPOB_CD AND A02.PYMT_YR_MNTH = A03.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND A02.PAY_CD = A03.PAY_CD AND A02.PAYR_SEIL_NUM = A03.PAYR_SEIL_NUM GROUP BY A03.DPOB_CD, A03.PYMT_YR_MNTH, A03.SYSTEMKEY ) AC02 WHERE AC01.DPOB_CD = AC02.DPOB_CD AND AC01.PYMT_YR_MNTH = AC02.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND AC01.SYSTEMKEY = AC02.SYSTEMKEY ) BB WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH LIKE #edacRvyy# ||'%'
AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AND EXISTS ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DEPT_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM TABLE(PKG_DTIL_AUTH.FN_DTIL_AUTH_TB(#dpobCd#,#payrMangDeptYn#,#payrMangDeptCd#,#deptCd#,#usrId#,#deptCdAuth#,'' )) ) C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND C.DEPT_CD = AA.DEPT_CD AND NVL(C.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') = NVL(AA.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') AND NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT') = NVL(AA.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT')
C.DEPT_CD = #deptCd#
)
AA.BUSIN_CD=#businCd#
BB.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#
AA.EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd#
AA.TYP_OCCU_CD = #typOccuCd#
AA.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD = #dtilOccuInttnCd#
AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
BB.HAN_NM LIKE '%' || #hanNm# || '%'
NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM (SELECT KF01.DPOB_CD , KF01.EDAC_RVYY , KF01.SETT_GBCD , KF01.SYSTEMKEY FROM YETA3210 KF01 ) KK01 WHERE KK01.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND KK01.EDAC_RVYY = #edacRvyy# AND KK01.SETT_GBCD = #settGbcd# AND KK01.SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY)
)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YETA3210 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# , SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# , ELCT_YYMM=#elctYymm# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , ELCT_DATE=#elctDate# , SUPR_TXAM=#suprTxam# , BUAM_TXAM=#buamTxam# , INBS_AMNT=#inbsAmnt# , STCK_INAM=#stckInam# , SPBM_TXAM=#spbmTxam# , ECIN_TXAM=#ecinTxam# , TAXM_ECIN=#taxmEcin# , TAXM_EARN=#taxmEarn# , TAXM_ETAM=#taxmEtam# , TXET_TXAM=#txetTxam# , ADDR_BHTX=#addrBhtx# , SPCI_HLTH=#spciHlth# , SPCI_EMPF=#spciEmpf# , NATN_PSNF=#natnPsnf# , EARN_TAXN=#earnTaxn# , IHTX_TAXN=#ihtxTaxn# , ETCC_TXAM=#etccTxam# , ETCC_ETAM=#etccEtam# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND ELCT_YYMM=#elctYymm# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YETA3210 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND ELCT_YYMM=#elctYymm# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

DELETE FROM YETA3210 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , ELCT_YYMM , SYSTEMKEY , ELCT_DATE , SUPR_TXAM , BUAM_TXAM , INBS_AMNT , STCK_INAM , SPBM_TXAM , ECIN_TXAM , TAXM_ECIN , TAXM_EARN , TAXM_ETAM , TXET_TXAM , ADDR_BHTX , SPCI_HLTH , SPCI_EMPF , NATN_PSNF , EARN_TAXN , IHTX_TAXN , ETCC_TXAM , ETCC_ETAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3210 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND ELCT_YYMM=#elctYymm# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , ELCT_YYMM , SYSTEMKEY , ELCT_DATE , SUPR_TXAM , BUAM_TXAM , INBS_AMNT , STCK_INAM , SPBM_TXAM , ECIN_TXAM , TAXM_ECIN , TAXM_EARN , TAXM_ETAM , TXET_TXAM , ADDR_BHTX , SPCI_HLTH , SPCI_EMPF , NATN_PSNF , EARN_TAXN , IHTX_TAXN , ETCC_TXAM , ETCC_ETAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3210 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
EDAC_RVYY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , EDAC_RVYY DESC , SETT_GBCD DESC , ELCT_YYMM DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YETA3210 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
EDAC_RVYY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
